contentSourceType.name: JBossASPatchSource
contentSourceType.description: This content source retrieves packages from the JBoss CSP RSS feed.

c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.description: Username used to log into the feed.

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: Password used to log into the feed.

c:simple-property.name: active
c:simple-property.description: Indicates if this instance should go out and check the feed for packages.

c:simple-property.name: proxyUrl
c:simple-property.description: Optional. URL of the proxy server to use for this connection.

c:simple-property.name: proxyPort
c:simple-property.description: Optional. Port of the proxy server to use for this connection.

c:simple-property.name: proxyUsername
c:simple-property.description: Optional. If the proxy requires authentication, this is the user to log in as.

c:simple-property.name: proxyPassword
c:simple-property.description: Optional. If the proxy requires authentitcation, this is the password for the user.
